240f9327-d9ac-416d-af44-049ca1086029.description: Earners of the CBCP badge are professionals who have demonstrated the knowledge and working experience required in business continuity. Earners have demonstrated the ability to analyze business impacts in order to develop and implement appropriate business continuity plans. These individuals are also capable of maintaining and exercising business continuity plans as designed.
240f9327-d9ac-416d-af44-049ca1086029.name: Certified Business Continuity Professional (CBCP)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess at least two years of significant, practical experience in five of the subject areas of the Professional Practices for Business Continuity Management
Pass the Qualifying Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification

a8fac012-8048-4a39-98d8-eccf68a83d67.description: Earners of the ABCP badge are new to the profession and have entry-level proficiency with some knowledge in business continuity planning, but they have not yet acquired a great deal of experience in the field.
a8fac012-8048-4a39-98d8-eccf68a83d67.name: Associate Business Continuity Professional (ABCP)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess less than two years of significant, practical experience in business continuity and related areas
Pass the Qualifying Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification

f788b076-5785-49af-9e2f-736e25a55898.description: Earners of the MBCP badge are those with superior knowledge and significant experience in the business continuity profession. They are required to have broad business continuity experience, and in most cases these professionals guide their practices, departments, or organization with a high level of skill and expertise. The MBCP is DRI's highest level of certification and automatically entitles the earner to membership in the Order of the Sword & Shield National Honor Society (OSSNHS).
f788b076-5785-49af-9e2f-736e25a55898.name: Master Business Continuity Professional (MBCP)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess at least five years of significant, practical experience in seven of the subject areas of the Professional Practices for Business Continuity Management
Pass the Qualifying Examination
Pass the Masters Case Study Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification

8477cc4b-6b59-4a9d-83a4-5df4b4d370ac.description: Earners of the CCRP badge are professionals who have significant business continuity and cybersecurity knowledge and experience, as well as an extensive understanding of how these disciplines must work together to achieve true cyber resilience.
8477cc4b-6b59-4a9d-83a4-5df4b4d370ac.name: Certified Cyber Resilience Professional (CCRP)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess at least two years of significant, practical experience in cyber resilience and business continuity related areas
Complete the Cyber Resilience for the Business Continuity Professional course
Pass the Cyber Resilience Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification

46443164-bc83-41f1-99b1-65fd9619ab86.description: Earners of the ACRP badge are new to the profession and have entry-level proficiency with some knowledge of business continuity and cybersecurity, but have not yet acquired a great deal of experience in the field.
46443164-bc83-41f1-99b1-65fd9619ab86.name: Associate Cyber Resilience Professional (ACRP)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess less than two years of significant, practical experience in cyber resilience and business continuity related areas
Complete the Cyber Resilience for the Business Continuity Professional course
Pass the Cyber Resilience Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification

954e4997-eb76-451c-9a66-7661b255dfc5.description: Earners of the CRMP badge are professionals who have a specialized background in risk management. Earners possess the foundation level knowledge and experience required to implement and manage a business risk management program.
954e4997-eb76-451c-9a66-7661b255dfc5.name: Certified Risk Management Professional (CRMP)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess at least two years of significant, practical experience in four of the risk managment practice areas
Pass the Risk Management Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification
Complete the Risk Management Continuity course

6927263a-b5d8-47c4-82e5-6aa5d934f291.description: Earners of the ARMP badge are professionals who are new to risk management. Earners have entry-level proficiency with knowledge in risk management, but have not yet acquired a great deal of experience in the field.
6927263a-b5d8-47c4-82e5-6aa5d934f291.name: Associate Risk Management Professional (ARMP)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess less than two years of risk managment experience
Complete the Risk Management Continuity course
Pass the Risk Management Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification

4e63b3e2-4fa8-409b-a7da-53c97a5741d4.description: Earners of the CBCLA badge are audit team leaders and reflect significant audit experience as well as extensive understanding in emergency management, enterprise risk management, and business continuity. Earners typically have been responsible for planning, scheduling, and implementing audit programs.
4e63b3e2-4fa8-409b-a7da-53c97a5741d4.name: Certified Business Continuity Lead Auditor (CBCLA)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess at least five years of significant, practical experience
Complete the Business Continuituy Planning for Auditors course
Pass the Audit Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification

ccef59d3-d924-48ea-b2a3-b14682cb264c.description: Earners of the CFCP badge are professionals who have a special skill set within the business continuity and disaster recovery profession. An example of this would be an expert in IT recovery, application testing, or business impact analysis (BIA). Earners have demonstrated knowledge and working experience in business continuity/disaster recovery.
ccef59d3-d924-48ea-b2a3-b14682cb264c.name: Certified Functional Continuity Professional (CFCP)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess at least two years of significant, practical experience in three of the subject areas of the Professional Practices for Business Continuity Management
Pass the Qualifying Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification

bf51da56-6186-41bc-9c2c-17a588384d13.description: Earners of the CBCV badge are vendors who recognize the importance of business continuity and disaster recovery best practices - those with the same level of commitment to the resilience profession as the clients they serve. Earners have demonstrated some knowledge in business continuity planning, but are non-practitioners who provide services to the industry.
bf51da56-6186-41bc-9c2c-17a588384d13.name: Certified Business Continuity Vendor (CBCV)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess at least two years of significant, practical experience
Pass the Qualifying Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification

2cfb2a35-c482-44df-8bc4-4e6e4fc0a9af.description: Earners of the CBCA badge are specialists who can verify the effectiveness of an organization's business continuity program against the landscape of standards, guidelines, and industry regulations. Earners not only demonstrate knowledge and experience in the fields of business continuity planning, emergency management and/or audit, but also demonstrate an ability to validate and evaluate plans based on any applicable standard.
2cfb2a35-c482-44df-8bc4-4e6e4fc0a9af.name: Certified Business Continuity Auditor (CBCA)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess at least two years of significant, practical experience
Complete the Business Continuity Planning for Auditors course
Pass the Audit Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification

d6f7630f-8723-445e-9ec0-2838f72a63cc.description: Earners of the CHPCP badge are professionals who have demonstrated knowledge and working experience in healthcare business continuity planning. Earners have not only demonstrated knowledge and skill in the healthcare business continuity/disaster recovery profession, but also have extensive industry experience as leaders.
d6f7630f-8723-445e-9ec0-2838f72a63cc.name: Certified Healthcare Provider Continuity Professional (CHPCP)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess at least two years of significant, practical experience in five of the subject areas of the Professional Practices for Business Continuity Management
Pass the Healthcare Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification

aac2882e-9f07-4dba-bfc8-3bf8162471c5.description: Earners of the AHPCP badge are new to the profession and have entry-level proficiency with some knowledge in healthcare business continuity planning, but they have not yet acquired a great deal of experience in the field.
aac2882e-9f07-4dba-bfc8-3bf8162471c5.name: Associate Healthcare Provider Continuity Professional (AHPCP)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess less than two years of significant, practical experience in healthcare business continuity and related areas
Pass the Healthcare Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification

eb057f12-8737-44a5-b153-0f9dc68b6c3e.description: Earners of the CPSCP badge are professionals who have demonstrated knowledge and working experience in public sector planning. Earners have both the knowledge of and experience in public sector continuity/disaster recovery and have been working in or with the public sector as leaders.
eb057f12-8737-44a5-b153-0f9dc68b6c3e.name: Certified Public Sector Continuity Professional (CPSCP)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess at least two years of significant, practical experience in five of the subject areas of the Professional Practices for Business Continuity Management
Pass the Public Sector Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification

03880c0e-7cd2-4c84-83a6-00eea869aa5a.description: Earners of the APSCP badge are new to the profession and have entry-level proficiency with some knowledge in public sector planning, but they have not yet acquired a great deal of experience in the field.
03880c0e-7cd2-4c84-83a6-00eea869aa5a.name: Associate Public Sector Continuity Professional (APSCP)

badge_template_activities.title: Possess less than two years of significant, practical experience in public sector planning and related areas
Pass the Public Sector Examination
Complete the Online Application for Professional Certification
